metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Darkly comedic superhero satire that fits with your Sci-Fi, Action & Adventure and Comedy interests, similar to Rick and Morty but live action.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A German sci-fi mystery with complex plots and time travel elements, appealing to fans of Stranger Things and All Her Fault.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller with a mystery at its core, akin to Fallout and Stranger Things but with a unique premise.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British comedy with a unique POV style that is similar to It's Always Sunny and Goodness Gracious Me.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and satirical themes of technology, aligning with Love, Death & Robots and Sci-Fi interests.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Anthology crime drama with dark humor and compelling characters, connecting to All Her Fault, The Night Manager and Brassic.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: A psychological thriller with suspense and technological themes, similar to the mystery and drama elements in HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Comedy series with an ensemble cast that is similar to Scrubs and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with a unique premise that is similar to Futurama and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on the classic detective with strong mysteries, aligning with All Her Fault and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: Crime drama with compelling characters and suspenseful plot, similar to the crime elements in All Her Fault and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Comedy series with an ensemble cast that is similar to Scrubs and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Cult comedy series with a unique sense of humor that is similar to It's Always Sunny and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Dark comedy about a hitman trying to become an actor, blending crime and humor like Brassic.

metas.name: BoJack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy with mature themes and emotional depth, similar to Rick and Morty but with a more dramatic tone.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: Comedy-drama with surreal and insightful commentary on race and culture, similar to the unique tone of Brassic.

metas.name: Westworld
metas.description: Sci-fi Western with philosophical themes and complex storytelling, fitting with your interest in Sci-Fi and drama.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi with political intrigue and compelling characters, similar to Foundation.

metas.name: Orphan Black
metas.description: Sci-fi thriller with suspenseful plot and strong character development, aligning with Stranger Things and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Comedy following a group of vampire roommates, with a mockumentary style similar to Parks and Recreation and The Office.

metas.name: Derry Girls
metas.description: Comedy set in Northern Ireland during The Troubles, with similar humour to Brassic and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a unique premise, fitting with your appreciation for Futurama and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Sci-fi spy thriller with a complex plot and compelling characters, similar to The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero series with mature themes and graphic violence, aligning with One-Punch Man and The Boys.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: Animated series with a unique rotoscoping style, exploring themes of mental health and reality, aligning with Rick and Morty and Love, Death & Robots.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a quirky and absurd tone, similar to Rick and Morty and Doctor Who.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: Comedy-drama with a time loop premise and philosophical themes, similar to The Good Place and Futurama.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Comedy series with an ensemble cast and meta-humor, similar to Scrubs and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi miniseries with surreal visuals and psychological themes, aligning with Love, Death & Robots and Severance.

metas.name: The OA
metas.description: Mystery with elements of science fiction and fantasy, appealing to Stranger Things and Foundation fans.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: Dark comedy-drama about grief, written by Ricky Gervais, connecting to Brassic and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: Animated sci-fi comedy with a focus on characters and a story, similar to Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: Sci-fi series about time-travelers trying to prevent a catastrophic future, similar to Doctor Who.

metas.name: Warrior
metas.description: Action & Adventure crime drama with great fight scenes and well-developed characters.

metas.name: Tokyo Vice
metas.description: Crime drama set in Tokyo, inspired by true events, similar to All Her Fault and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Lockwood & Co.
metas.description: Action & Adventure Sci-Fi & Fantasy series that involves mystery and a great plot.

metas.name: Dead End: Paranormal Park
metas.description: Animation Sci-Fi & Fantasy series that involves comedy and fun animation.

metas.name: Extraordinary
metas.description: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Comedy series that involves great characters and a twist on a superhero story.

metas.name: Resident Alien
metas.description: Comedy Sci-Fi & Fantasy show that follows an alien that is trying to fit in.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Comedy, Sci-Fi & Fantasy show that follows different people and their afterlives.
